name: tray
description: adds an icon to the system tray/menubar for extra app/window management features (e.g. open on startup, a global hotkey).

options.label: open notion on startup
options.tooltip: **if the 'run notion in the background' option is also enabled, the app will open in background on startup** (this option may require relaunching the app BEFORE restarting your system to properly take effect)

options.label: run notion in the background
options.tooltip: **pressing the close button or toggling window visibility will hide the app, running notion in the background** (instead of quitting or minimizing it)
